subject: Horse Racing
Franchises
lead_paragraph: Empire Racing Associates has added Delaware North Companies as a partner in its bid to operate the Aqueduct, Belmont and Saratoga racetracks when the New York Racing Association's franchise on the tracks expires in 2007.
snippet: Empire Racing Associates has added Delaware North Companies as a partner in its bid to operate the Aqueduct, Belmont and Saratoga racetracks when the New York Racing Association's franchise on the tracks expires in 2007.
